snippet: Nate Wooley’s “Seven Storey Mountain” is a sequence of compositions based on Thomas Merton’s account of his spiritual quest.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews premiere of new version of jazz music piece The Seven Storey Mountain, composed and performed by trumpeter, improviser and composer Nate Wooley, at Issue Project Room.
lead_paragraph: Nate Wooley’s “Seven Storey Mountain” is a sequence of compositions based on Thomas Merton’s account of his spiritual quest.

headline.seo: ‘Seven Storey Mountain,’ by Nate Wooley - Issue Project Room
headline.main: Struggling Up a Mountain, Led by a Trumpet Blast
headline.print_headline: Struggling Up a Mountain, Led by a Trumpet Blast
